About Me

About This Site

I designed this site http://madhur.github.com in early 2010 with the intention of making it the one-stop-shop for all of my personal and professional information.

The Mechanics

The content of this site begins life as a directory full of text files on my Ubuntu written using the editor Gedit in a format called Markdown.

I push all of these out to my GitHub repository using the version control system git.

To update the site, the text files are first transformed into HTML by Maruku. Jekyll orchestrates the whole process, adding headers, navigation bars and the like, creating a directory full of static HTML ready to be served.

Licence
